info.name: Firefox New Tab - Purple Winter (about:newtab)
info.description:
A purple winter theme for the "about:home" page.

I would love to hear ideas. Any small change you think would improve the theme is greatly appreaciated, so drop a comment or an e-mail!

If you encounter any problems, or have any changes you would like to have made, then please send me a private message, make a review, or contact my email: saphkey@outlook.com
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:
v1.1 24.august.2016
- Changed border-radius of site links to be more round
- Made link text fonts bigger and link background color more proficient
- Added white "ice/frozen" tint around link-boxes
